name: Night Craft (Jakana, Nobunoda, Grimol)
description:
Team members: Arthur ROUELLE, Olivier ODAKA & Rodolphe JAKANA

Synopsis: A man is living in a closed forest in an eternal night. His only friend is this cube, or maybe not… You know what we say, “What is hidden in snow comes forth in the thaw”.

Gameplay instructions:

WASD to move

Spacebar to jump

E to interact

Q to drop item

Esc for the pause menu

What platform is your game built for ?

Windows

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission:

Assets:

  • “Interactive stylized lowpoly grass” by PROJECT NATURE
  • “GoodSky” by UNEASY
  • “Water materials” by THARLEVFX
  • Animation Starter Pack

Everything else is homemade.

Music:

Sakuya by Peritune http://peritune.com/

Promoted by MrSnooze https://youtu.be/I4xO5bqgYBk

Creative Commons — CC BY 3.0 https://goo.gl/Yibru5

SFX: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/

Font: “Barkentina” by KIRIL ZLATKOV on dafont.com

Main menu background image:

Wilson Ye @wilsonye123 unsplash.com

Game created for the “Unreal Spring Jam 2020”.
